evidence.text: 1 | 2025-06-04 | COMPLAINT against AmeriCorps (a.k.a the Corporation for National and Community Service), Jennifer Bastress Tahmasebi, Jayanta Bhattacharya, Doug Burgum, Matthew Buzzelli, Department Of Government Efficiency ("DOGE"), Department of Transportation, Sean Duffy, Amy Gleason, Pete Hegseth, Institute of Museum and Library Services, Robert F. Kennedy, Jr., Martin A. Makary, Michael McDonald, Linda McMahon, National Endowment for the Humanities, National Science Foundation, Brooke Rollins, Marco Rubio, Keith Sonderling, Brian Stone, Donald J. Trump, United States Centers for Disease Control, United States Department of Agriculture, United States Department of Defense, United States Department of Education, United States Department of Energy, United States Department of Health and Human Services, United States Department of State, United States Department of the Interior, United States Environmental Protection Agency, United States Food and Drug Administration, United States National Institutes of Health, Chris Wright, Lee Zeldin ( Filing fee $ 405, receipt number ACANDC-20754681.). Injunction against the US government/official or APA vacatur requested. Filed by Ken Alex, Neeta Thakur, Jedda Foreman, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou. (Cabraser, Elizabeth) (Filed on 6/4/2025) (Entered: 06/04/2025)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs Ken Alex, Neeta Thakur, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, and Jedda Foreman filed a Complaint on June 4, 2025, requesting an injunction against the U.S. government and officials and APA vacatur, alleging administrative law violations.

evidence.text: 7 | 2025-06-05 | MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause filed by Neeta Thakur, Ken Alex, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, Jedda Foreman. (Attachments: # 1 Plaintiff's Memorandum in Support of Motion for Temporary Restraining Order, # 2 [Proposed] Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause)(Schoenberg, Anthony) (Filed on 6/5/2025) (Entered: 06/05/2025)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause on June 5, 2025, requesting the court to issue a TRO to prevent government actions pending the full hearing on the merits.

evidence.text: 18 | 2025-06-05 | MOTION to Certify Class filed by Neeta Thakur, Ken Alex, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, Jedda Foreman. Responses due by 6/20/2025. Replies due by 6/27/2025. (Attachments: # 1 Declaration of E. Cabraser ISO Class Certification Motion, # 2 Proposed Order Granting Class Certification and Appointing Class Counsel)(Cabraser, Elizabeth) (Filed on 6/5/2025) (Entered: 06/05/2025)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Motion to Certify Class on June 5, 2025, requesting the court to certify a class action for the claims brought in the Complaint.

evidence.text: 68 | 2025-07-18 | AMENDED COMPLAINT against All Defendants. Filed by Ken Alex, Neeta Thakur, Jedda Foreman, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, Eli Berman, Susan Handy. (Attachments: # 1 Redline)(Cabraser, Elizabeth) (Filed on 7/18/2025) (Entered: 07/18/2025)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs Ken Alex, Neeta Thakur, Jedda Foreman, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, Eli Berman, and Susan Handy filed an Amended Complaint on July 18, 2025, adding additional defendants and expanding the scope of the lawsuit to include new claims against government agencies.
